content.query:
DROP TABLE [Staging].[Fact]
CREATE TABLE [Staging].[Fact]
(
    [SalesOrderNumber] nvarchar(20),
	[SalesOrderLineNumber] nvarchar(4000),
	[CustomerKey] nvarchar(4000),
	[ProductKey] nvarchar(4000),
	[OrderDateKey] nvarchar(4000),
	[DueDateKey] nvarchar(4000),
	[ShipDateKey] nvarchar(4000),
	[PromotionKey] nvarchar(4000),
	[CurrencyKey] nvarchar(4000),
	[SalesTerritoryKey] nvarchar(4000),
	[OrderQuantity] nvarchar(4000),
	[UnitPrice] nvarchar(4000),
	[ExtendedAmount] nvarchar(4000),
	[UnitPriceDiscountPct] nvarchar(4000),
	[DiscountAmount] nvarchar(4000),
	[ProductStandardCost] nvarchar(4000),
	[TotalProductCost] nvarchar(4000),
	[SalesAmount] nvarchar(4000),
	[TaxAmount] nvarchar(4000),
	[FreightAmount] nvarchar(4000),
	[CarrierTrackingNumber] nvarchar(4000),
	[CustomerPONumber] nvarchar(4000),
	[RevisionNumber]	 nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO

COPY INTO [Staging].[Fact]
(
	[SalesOrderNumber] 1,
	[SalesOrderLineNumber] 2,
	[CustomerKey] 3,
	[ProductKey] 4,
	[OrderDateKey] 5,
	[DueDateKey] 6,
	[ShipDateKey] 7,
	[PromotionKey] 8,
	[CurrencyKey] 9,
	[SalesTerritoryKey] 10,
	[OrderQuantity] 11,
	[UnitPrice] 12,
	[ExtendedAmount] 13,
	[UnitPriceDiscountPct] 14,
	[DiscountAmount] 15,
	[ProductStandardCost] 16,
	[TotalProductCost] 17,
	[SalesAmount] 18,
	[TaxAmount] 19,
	[FreightAmount] 20,
	[CarrierTrackingNumber] 21,
	[CustomerPONumber] 22,
	[RevisionNumber] 23
)
FROM 'https://datalake3mstaeetovkk4.dfs.core.windows.net/landing/Allfiles/03/data/FactInternetSales.txt'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIELDTERMINATOR = '\t'
	,FIRSTROW = 1
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://datalake3mstaeetovkk4.dfs.core.windows.net/landing/'
)
--END
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [Staging].[Fact]

GO
